While in your defensive stance, you can make opportunity attack without use your reaction, and you can use your reaction to make a melee attack against a creature that move more than 5 foot while within your reach.

Starting at 2nd level, you can push yourself beyond your normal limit for a moment. On your turn, you can take one additional action.

At 3rd level, you choose an archetype that you strive to emulate in your combat style and technique. The archetype you choose grant you feature at 3rd level and again at 7th, 10th, 15th, and 18th level.

When you reach 4th level, and again at 6th, 8th, 12th, 14th, 16th, and 19th level, you can increase one ability score of your choice by 2, or you can increase two ability score of your choice by 1. As normal, you ca n't increase an ability score above 20 use this feature.
